component.name: EVE Preview Manager
component.summary: Utility for EVE Online multiboxing with real-time previews and hotkeys

description.p: EVE Preview Manager is a lightweight utility designed to enhance the EVE Online multi-boxing experience.

ul.li: Live Previews: Real-time thumbnails of all running clients.
Rapid Switching: Robust hotkey support to instantly switch focus between clients.
Customization: Configurable font, borders, colors, size, opacity, and more
Profiles: Save and load multiple configurations on the fly for different setups

description.p: NOTE: This application is not affiliated with CCP Games.

ul.li: Fixed previewing custom sources launched via Steam/Proton that could cause crashes.
Fixed window re-detection for minimized clients to correctly preserve character settings, cycle group state, and preview rendering.

Automated Backups: EPM now automatically backs up your config. Backups are compressed (1-2Kb each) to keep storage impact minimal. Automatically prunes the oldest files. Manual backups are preserved indefinitely.
Custom Source Settings: Integrated sources into cycle groups, added per-source hotkeys, and per-source visual overrides.
Cycle Groups: Added new option (off by default) that resets the cycle order to the beginning of the list when swapping between separate cycle groups.
Logging: Added --debug flag for troubleshooting and reduced standard log verbosity to keep the output less cluttered.
Custom Sources: Resolved issues with preview persistence, positioning, auto-detection logic, and borders not being applied.
Overrides: Fixed a bug where per-character override settings (like static backgrounds) would fail to persist after a character logged out and back in.
Expanded cycle groups: Profiles now support multiple independent cycle groups, enabling cycling through multiple groups of characters with separate hotkeys.
Custom Sources: Experimental support for adding and previewing custom windows.
Preview Toggle: New hotkey to temporarily disable or enable thumbnail previews.
Static Mode: A new per-character override that allows you to use a solid color for the thumbnail background instead of a live preview.
Added a setting to disable/enable the "MINIMIZED" overlay text when using the "Minimize EVE clients when switching focus" feature.
Fixed a bug where inactive client borders were not rendered until the client was focused at least once before.
Updated AppStream metainfo for Flathub submission
Preparations for Flathub and Arch AUR submissions
Tabbed GUI: Rearranged the GUI to use a tabbed structure for settings components.
Inactive Client Borders: Customizable border color and thickness for inactive clients.
Advanced Character Management:
Aliases: Create custom names (e.g., "Main", "Super") for previews.
Visual Overrides: Configure border color, text color, and size on a per-character basis.
Load Profile Hotkey: Instantly load a specific profile via hotkey.
Temporary Cycle Skip: Hotkey to temporarily skip a character in the cycle group (resets on refresh/swap).
Flexible Character Hotkeys: Per-character hotkeys now work even if not in the cycle group.
Enforced XWayland: The app now enforces X11/XWayland mode to ensure reliable hotkeys without the user being in the input group.
